title: ChangeEvent
description: This schema defines the change event type to capture the changes to entities. Entity changes due to user activity, such as updating description of a dataset, changing ownership, or adding new tags. Entity also changes due to activities at the metadata sources, such as a new dataset was created, a datasets was deleted, or schema of a dataset is modified. When state of entity changes, an event is produced. These events can be used to build apps and bots that respond to the change from activities.

method.description: HTTP Method used in a call.

responseCode.description: HTTP response code for the api requested.

userName.description: Name of the user whose activity resulted in the change.

operation.description: API operation that was result of user activity resulted in the change.

dateTime.description: Date and time when the change was made.

oldVersion.description: Version of the entity before the change

newVersion.description: Version of the entity before the change
